# NrcAlterSHGC

## Description
Changes solar heat gain coefficient of simple glazing systems

## Modeler Description
Get simple glazing systems and change the SHGC 

## Measure Type
ModelMeasure

## Taxonomy


## Arguments


### Set SHGC

**Name:** new_shgc,
**Type:** Double,
**Units:** ,
**Required:** true,
**Model Dependent:** false
